truth

naive.ba1.truth = ⊤

The system function class.

Definition: A system function, in the context of the naive package, is a function that is predefined in the sense that it is accompanied by a programmatic algorithm and not a formula, and atomic in the sense that it cannot be further decomposed into constituent sub-formulae.
